title: Torrential Rain
description: + 1 Water per Rain Catcher; + 1 Food per Gather Card this turn; Person with the lowest leadership value this round loses 1 Leisure

title: Feast!!
description: Lose X Food, gain X Leisure. Leader decides the amount and distribution

title: Poor Construction
description: Your childlike construction work is not good enough. Lose 1 Shelter card of your choosing.

title: Council Day
description: Everyone can talk freely today! (Players may use global chat).

title: Group Disagreements
description: Draw 1 less card for this turn

title: Scorching Hot Day
description: Your Rain Catchers produce nothing today

title: Leadership Crisis
description: No one can speak this turn
